verbs.description: reboiler (third-person singular simple present reboilers, present participle reboilering, simple past and past participle reboilered)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To equip with a new boiler.
examples: Whereas nearly all of about 20 pre-1860 locomotives existing in this country have been reframed, reboilered, or in other respects lost their identity through reconstruction  […]
